title: Failure to comply with court orders
context: [ยง346-246] Failure to comply with court orders. The court may apply contempt of court provisions and all other provisions available under the law if a party fails to comply with the terms and conditions of any order issued under this part. [L 1989, c 381, pt of ยง1; am L 1990, c 144, ยง1 and c 234, ยง9]
